description: Port Vale's promotion hopes suffer another blow as they were held to a goalless draw against Harrogate at Vale Park.
title: Port Vale 0-0 Harrogate Town
title_page: Port Vale 0-0 Harrogate Town: Promotion-chasing Vale frustrated - BBC Sport
maintext:
Port Vale are unbeaten across their five Football League games against Harrogate Town (W3 D2), winning the reverse fixture this season 1-0 in October.
As well as failing to beat Port Vale in five attempts in the Football League (D2 L3), Harrogate Town have also only scored one goal in total across those matches.
Port Vale have won each of their last four home league games, last winning five in succession in September 2016 in League One.
Harrogate have lost each of their last four away games in League Two, never before losing five in a row on their travels in the competition.
